Supriya Sagiraju is currently pursuing a Master of Science in Advanced Data Analytics at the University of North Texas.

She obtained her Bachelor of Science in Biotechnology from the Gandhi Institute of Technology and Management in Visakhapatnam. For the past 8 months, she has been employed as a Data Engineer for Amazon Development Centre India Pvt Ltd in Hyderabad, AP.

She has extensive expertise in Python, SQL, and Big Data technologies, such as Hadoop, Hive, and Tableau.</p>

She is proficient in Tableau, Eclipse, RStudio, Python, Eclipse, and Microsoft Office.
